title: Parkinson a Captain of the Maroons- context

content.description:
Leonard Parkinson, a Captain of the Maroons, 1796
Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, Manuscripts, Archives and Rare Books Division, The New York Public Library.
content.question: Which of the following was a primary reason for the success of some maroon communities?

choices.label: Maroons advocated for the rights of women.
Maroons often lived in hidden environments.
Maroons adapted Christian hymns to African rhythms.

content.answer: Maroons often lived in hidden environments.

topic.text: 2.15: Maroon Societies and Autonomous Black Communities

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
